# The recipe for the Iron Gear Wheel requires 2 iron plates to craft one gear wheel. 
# Since I currently have 1 iron plate, I will need to smelt more iron ore to produce additional iron plates.

# Given that the furnace is still operational and has remaining iron ore, I will allow it to continue smelting until all the iron ore is processed.
# I will wait until the furnace has finished smelting all the iron ore.

# Implementing a wait loop to check the furnace until it has no more iron ore left.
while True:
    inventory_furnace = inspect_inventory(furnace)  # Inspecting the furnace contents
    if inventory_furnace[Prototype.IronOre] == 0:  # Check if there is no more iron ore
        break
    sleep(1)  # Wait for 1 second between checks

# After smelting is complete, I will check the final inventory of the furnace.
final_inventory_furnace = inspect_inventory(furnace)
print(f"Final Furnace Inventory: {final_inventory_furnace}")  # Display the final contents of the furnace after smelting.
